about.title: Software Engineer - Front end
about.summary: Front-end Developer with nearly 4 years of experience, specializing in $ReactJS$$ and other front-end technologies. Skilled in $TypeScript$$, $Ant Design$$, $Bootstrap$$, $jQuery$$, $Tailwinds$$ and $JavaScript$$. After 2 years at 1@Halozend@@, I successfully contributed to projects for clients in the US and Vietnam. Currently, I am leveraging my skills at 2@Dision@@ to develop innovative solutions for clients in Germany. Additionally, I have experience integrating APIs based on backend technologies like Golang and PHP, utilizing both NoSQL and SQL databases, and implementing real-time features using $WebSocket$$. Renowned for my commitment to delivering high-quality results and effectively tackling complex challenges.

technical.Frameworks/_Platforms: ReactJS, Next.js, Antd, Tailwinds, Vanilla JS, Wordpress, VueJS, Vitest, Laravel, React Native, Angular, NodeJS, Docker, Bootstrap, Tanstack, ...
technical.IDEs: Visual Studio Code, PHPStorm, XCode, Android Studio, Sublime text, Visual Studio

education.Knowledge: C++, C#, Java, Microsoft SQL Server,...

experiences.description: Demonstrated expertise in CSS/SCSS, HTML, TypeScript, and JavaScript, along with proficiency in Reactjs, Nextjs, Redux, Antd, Bootstrap and Tailwinds. Efficiently managed source code using Gitea for version control. Collaborated with Product Managers to align technical solutions following requirements, ensuring effective communication and issue resolution. Provided technical support and guidance to team members, fostering a collaborative work environment. Contributed to diverse projects, showcasing adaptability and a strong aptitude for learning emerging technology.

Demonstrated versatile expertise in implementing new features and resolving issues across Client-Side (JavaScript, jQuery, Angular, HTML, CSS), Server-Side (PHP, Laravel, Restful API), and Mobile App (React Native, TypeScript) development. Proficiently used version control systems like Gitea, Gitlab for source code management. Collaborated effectively with team leaders to clarify requirements and provide technical insights. Actively assisted fellow team members in overcoming technical challenges.
